PM Christopher Luxon adamant bootcamp pilot not a failure, hints at changes after youths absconded https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/pm-christopher-luxon-adamant-bootcamp-pilot-not-a-failure-hints-at-changes-after-youths-absconded/37HROMIWQRFOHN7GSHUGNK3G3U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/pm-christopher-luxon-adamant-bootcamp-pilot-not-a-failure-hints-at-changes-after-youths-absconded/37HROMIWQRFOHN7GSHUGNK3G3U/ Adam PearseTwo participants who absconded have been arrested after going missing for days. Mon, 09 Dec 2024 06:04:07 +0000 One of the bootcamp participants died in a crash involving a car and bus near Tirau which left 13 others injured. New data shows the teen was driving one of the vehicles.
Te Puke man Joseph Riwhi extradited to Australia to stand trial for alleged violence https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/te-puke-man-joseph-riwhi-extradited-to-australia-to-stand-trial-for-alleged-violence/LRP4PCGRQBAFJJNACL7EGMMBVY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/te-puke-man-joseph-riwhi-extradited-to-australia-to-stand-trial-for-alleged-violence/LRP4PCGRQBAFJJNACL7EGMMBVY/ Hannah BartlettA man's lost his bid to stay in NZ and avoid criminal trial across the ditch. Photo / Hannah Bartlett
